FROM node:6-alpine

MAINTAINER Ferdinand MÃ¼tsch <mail@ferdinand-muetsch.de>

WORKDIR /app

ENV MININOTE_PORT 3000

COPY . /app/

VOLUME ["/app/data"]

RUN cd /app && npm install && npm cache clean --force;

RUN cd /app/mininote-frontend && \
    npm install && \
    npm run build && \
    cd .. && npm cache clean --force;

ENTRYPOINT npm start
